title: Скъпи наследници
overview: Скъпи наследници tells the story of a big dysfuctional family, forced to live together again in the village of Beli Vit to come into the huge inheritance left by the old head of the family. The descendants must live under one roof, in the old family house for one year, without leaving the village for more than 12 hours. The clash of interests will change the characters, their desires and principles. Traditions and modern tendencies meet inovative business ideas and the values of the patriarchal and the modern families collide. Скъпи наследници is the first bulgarian tv series shot in an authentic village, build especially for the shootings, in Hollywood style. Some scenes are shot in various urban locations, as well as in some of the most beautiful places in Bulgarian and around the world. The cast brings together some of the most loved and popular actors, who will stand shoulder to shoulder with the new generation of movie and tv stars.
